alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Pike; Southern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lackawanna, southwestern Wayne and west central Pike Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arlington, or 13 miles south of Honesdale, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moscow, Sterling, Lehigh, Greentown, Gouldsboro, Ledgerdale, Angels, Arlington, Panther and Newfoundland. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 84 between 17 and 20. Interstate 380 between 20 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
